memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEv, GradientsP< T > XGrad, FluxP< T > XFlux, T *dtmax, T *zb)
memberdef.name: updateKurgXGPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel for updating X-direction fluxes using the Kurganov scheme.

detaileddescription.para: Computes fluxes and time step constraints for each cell in the X direction (based on kurganov and Petrova 2007).

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEv, GradientsP< T > XGrad, FluxP< T > XFlux, T *zb)
memberdef.name: AddSlopeSourceXGPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel for adding topographic slope source terms in X direction.

detaileddescription.para: Updates fluxes with slope source terms for well-balanced solutions (based on Kurganov and Petrova 2007).

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEv, GradientsP< T > XGrad, FluxP< T > XFlux, T *dtmax, T *zb)
memberdef.name: updateKurgXCPU

briefdescription.para: Host function for updating X-direction fluxes using the Kurganov scheme.

detaileddescription.para: Computes fluxes and time step constraints for each cell in the X direction on CPU (based on kurganov and Petrova 2007).

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEv, GradientsP< T > XGrad, FluxP< T > XFlux, T *zb)
memberdef.name: AddSlopeSourceXCPU

briefdescription.para: Host function for adding topographic slope source terms in X direction.

detaileddescription.para: Updates fluxes with slope source terms for well-balanced solutions on CPU (based on kurganov and Petrova 2007).

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEv, GradientsP< T > XGrad, FluxP< T > XFlux, T *dtmax, T *zb)
memberdef.name: updateKurgYGPU

briefdescription.para: CUDA kernel for updating Y-direction fluxes using the Kurganov scheme.

detaileddescription.para: Computes fluxes and time step constraints for each cell in the Y direction (based on kurganov and Petrova 2007).

sect4.title: Topographic source term
sect4.para: In the case of adaptive refinement, care must be taken to ensure well-balancing at coarse/fine faces (see [notes/balanced.tm]()).

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, BlockP< T > XBlock, EvolvingP< T > XEv, GradientsP< T > XGrad, FluxP< T > XFlux, T *zb)

memberdef.name: KurgSolver

briefdescription.para: Kurganov-Petrova approximate Riemann solver for fluxes and time step.

detaileddescription.para: Computes fluxes and time step for the Kurganov scheme given left/right states and velocities (based on kurganov and Petrova 2007).
